about_the_game:
Add-on for Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth, containing legendary Sujimon to recruit for battle and items to raise their strength, as well as legendary guests for Dondoko Island and items to improve your resort's hospitality.

* Please be aware that this bundle is included in the Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth Ultimate Edition.
* This bundle can only be purchased once.

Includes:
- Legendary Sujimon Set
Sujimon: Majima
Sujimon: Saejima
Sujimon: Daigo
Sujimon: Akiyama
Sujimon: Tiger (Legend)
Sujimon: Bear (Legend)

- Sujimon Raising Set
Sujimunch (Single-Use Special) x 300
Super Sujimunch (Single-Use Special) x 150
Hyper Sujimunch (Single-Use Special) x 100
Extreme Sujimunch (Single-Use Special) x 10
Committee Agent (Single-Use Special) x 100
Master Suji Gift (Single-Use Special) x 100

- Legendary Guests Set
Guest: Goro Majima
Guest: Taiga Saejima
Guest: Daigo Dojima
Guest: Shun Akiyama
Guest: Makoto Date
Guest: Ono Michio
Guest: Robo Michio
Guest: Yuki
Guest: Koyuki

- Dondoko Island Booster Set
Wood (Single-Use Special) x 1000
Stone (Single-Use Special) x 1000
Cloth (Single-Use Special) x 1000
Iron (Single-Use Special) x 1000
Plastic (Single-Use Special) x 1000
Glass (Single-Use Special) x 1000
Semiconductor (Single-Use Special) × 1000
Dondoko Scuttler (Single-Use Special) x 300
Red Dondo Bug (Single-Use Special) x 300
Green Dondo Bug (Single-Use Special) x 300
Dondoko Mollusk (Single-Use Special) x 300
Dondoko Mushroom (Single-Use Special) x 300
Dondoko Sirloin (Single-Use Special) x 300
Dondoko Egg (Single-Use Special) x 300
Dondoko Nut (Single-Use Special) x 150
Dondoko Herb (Single-Use Special) x 150

*Guests obtained from this pack will not count towards certain achievements.
*Sujimon obtained from this pack may not be assigned to facilities on Dondoko Island. Additionally, they cannot be used with Kasuga's Sujimancer job.
*Items in this pack will be consumed first when crafting on Dondoko Island.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Blood, Intense Violence, Sexual Themes, Strong Language, and Use of Tobacco and Alcohol.
